title: I read in yesterday\'s NY Times about the Conficker virus million or more attacks on computers. One scam mentioned told of a notification of a virus in an individual\'s computer and people are instructed to download a cure for a price. A week or so ago such a menu popped up on my monitor when I was on your website. I figured it was a trick and The only way I could get rid of it was to shut down by pulling the plug. Does this mean your site has been invaded by Conficker?
text:
After a thorough check with our web hosting source, it's clear there
has been no virus attached to the site. However, as I'm sure you
already know, if you don't click on those pop-up ads, you won't get
any virus attached to them. Thanks for inquiring!
